name: Magic Frame
description:
Magic Frame is an action-packed platformer adventure in which you have to sweat to defeat your enemies. Upgrade your equipment and your own skill to challenge the boss.

Features

  • Сhallenging levels with many enemies
  • Kill the boss - these are the only way to go further
  • Beware of traps
  • Avoid obstacles
  • Relive your childhood memories of classic platformers with high quality frame by frame pixel art
  • Pave your way through a satisfyingly smooth, but challenging platformer
